data.prayer: Lord, to the people of Vĩnh Phúc you say, "If you wait for Me, I will work on your behalf."
data.verse: For from of old men have not heard, nor perceived by the ear, neither has the eye seen a God besides you, who works for him who waits for him.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Vĩnh Phúc, Vietnam
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Lord, give grace to the local leaders who shepherd the 24,977 believers in the state of Vĩnh Phúc.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd. The good shepherd lays down his life for the sheep.

data.prayer: Jesus, please raise up evangelists to equip your people to share the gospel in Vĩnh Phúc.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Spirit, disrupt complacency in the 24,977 believers living in the state of Vĩnh Phúc. Remind them you are coming soon.
data.verse: Therefore, stay awake, for you do not know on what day your Lord is coming.

data.prayer: Lord, Let your Kingdom come among the Indonesian people. Let your will be done, as in heaven, so on earth.
Father, convict the 24,977 believers in Vĩnh Phúc to be holy and righteous. Inspire them to gather in small groups for accountability and spiritual growth.
Jesus, teach the believers in the state of Vĩnh Phúc that love for you and obedience to you are connected.
data.verse: If you love me, keep my commands.

data.section_summary:
the state of Vĩnh Phúc, Vietnam has a population of 1,154,800.

We estimate Vĩnh Phúc has 24,977 people who might know Jesus, 92,629 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,037,193 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 46 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, please convict the believers in Vĩnh Phúc, Vietnam to not assume the ministry is for professional clergy, but for all who have been called by you.
